overview: The story tells that Wei Lai has suffered many setbacks and failed her career. His girlfriend Jiang Yue, who has been in love for six years, also left. The credit loan owed to Wei Lai has been stimulated, and he has been drunk all day long. , Anesthetize yourself, my friend Yang Shan does not want to let him fall too deep, he gives encouragement and comfort, but it turned out to be self-defeating, the two turned against each other,
title: Blooming Youth
